label: Car Cleaning and Detailing
description: Products and services related to cleaning and detailing cars.
intents: Clean and maintain the appearance of a car
Remove dirt, stains, and other contaminants from a car
Restore and protect the exterior and interior of a car

subcategories.label: Car Detailing

subcategories.label: Mobile Car Valeting

subcategories.description: Products used for cleaning and detailing cars.

subcategories.description: Equipment used for cleaning and detailing cars.
